subject: Trades (Sports)
Football
lead_paragraph: Defensive end Richard Seymour made his first appearance at the Oakland Raiders facilities Saturday, saying at a news conference that he was “blindsided” by the trade last Sunday that sent him to Oakland from the New England Patriots. “I didn’t expect it,” he said. “I didn’t understand what was going on. So it’s like when something happens, when you’re blindsided, you have to step back and realize what situation you’re in.” The Patriots received a first-round pick in 2011 in the deal.
